findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner by setting certain variables to restrictive values.

findings.title: OTUT - Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer the balance of a user’s address to other addresses by calling the `airdrop` function.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.
